name: ChooseArizona
0:
”Alexa, ask Choose Arizona to watch videos”
”Alexa, ask Choose Arizona how close is the site to the airport?”
”Alexa, ask Choose Arizona to tell me about site development”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choose arizona
des:
This is the official proposal skill for HQ2 in Arizona, optimized for the Echo Show. Let me tell you why Arizona is the ideal location for HQ2. You can say things like:
“Alexa, watch flyover video”
"Alexa, watch message from the Governor"
“Alexa, what is the Everything Campus?”
“Alexa, tell me about the site”
“Alexa, is Arizona the best site for HQ2?”
"Alexa, what incentives is Arizona offering?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
